channel.title: Need help =(
channel.description: When ever i try to join someone server on moparscape i got on Help -> server status and it brings a list of online servers up so i go back on moparscape and go on File -> new server and then enter the IP of the server that was listed as online and then click Enter It says user name, Password and Server IP the IP is the one i put in on the new server so that is ok, but when i put a user n pass in and click login it comes up with a message saying "Error Connecting to server. Must be Down. Click Cancel and Start server to start your own", but i dont want to start my own i want to join someone else's .. Please help.

item.title: Need help =(
item.dc:creator: @JonnyClement JonnyClement
item.description:
@JonnyClement wrote:

Yep, it just refreshed and says that the server is online

Read full topic

item.description:
@JonnyClement wrote:

When ever i try to join someone server on moparscape i got on Help -> server status and it brings a list of online servers up so i go back on moparscape and go on File -> new server and then enter the IP of the server that was listed as online and then click Enter It says user name, Password and Server IP the IP is the one i put in on the new server so that is ok, but when i put a user n pass in and click login it comes up with a message saying
“Error Connecting to server. Must be Down. Click Cancel and Start server to start your own”, but i dont want to start my own i want to join someone else’s …
